Title: Relates to the definition of the term prospective relative guardian
Summary: Provides that no person shall be precluded from being deemed a "prospective relative guardian" based on whether such person's relationship with the child was established before or after such child's placement into foster care.
LawCode: Amd ยง458-a, Soc Serv L; amd ยง1028-a, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the family court act, in relation to the definition of the term "prospective relative guardian"
